page.title: 08Public Buildings
page.content: There are a number of primary schools in the area.They include Eagley Primary,Harwood Meadows,Hardy Mill, Hough Fold,Sharples Primary, St.Brendan's R.C. and Affetside. Turton High,Canon Slade C.of E. and Thornleigh R.C. College,the three secondary schools in the area ,are all 11-18 comprehensive schools but the last two have a selection procedure based upon religious beliefs. There are two lending libraries at Harwood Precinct and Bromley Cross. Both were built in the 1960's and the Bromley Cross library was built to resemble a boat. Blair's Hospital at Bromley Cross was built by a mill-owner in 1888.It is now a long stay geriatric hospital run by the National Health Service.It has sixty staff and thirty eight beds.
